definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
YMCA (international Christian youth movement, formed in 1844)

sentences.english: That's our repot today from the annual meeting of the Computer Manufacturers of America.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們今天來自美國計算機生產商年會的報道。

sentences.english: A recent survey from the Annals of Internal Medicine bears this out.
sentences.chinese: 《內科學年會》的一個近期的調查報道了這個問題。

sentences.english: Jia welcomed King Gyanendra to the annual conference of the forum.
sentences.chinese: 賈慶林歡迎賈南德拉國王來華出席博鰲亞洲論壇年會。

sentences.english: We expect politicians to defame each other in an election year.
sentences.chinese: 我們預料政客們在選舉年會互相誹謗。

sentences.english: That company is bankrolling our office party this year.
sentences.chinese: 那家公司將負責我公司今年年會的費用。

sentences.english: Is very pleased to participate in the China Development Forum 2010 will be.
sentences.chinese: 很高興參加中國發展高層論壇2010年會。

sentences.english: Mr. President, I’m with a great pleasure to attend this annual meeting.
sentences.chinese: 主席先生，我懷着非常愉快的心情出席本屆年會。

sentences.english: The next conference of the NEAT will be held in Thailandand sponsored by the ThammasatUniversity.
sentences.chinese: 下一次年會在泰國召開，由法政大學主辦。

sentences.english: All club members are requested to attend the annual meeting.
sentences.chinese: 請全體俱樂部會員出席年會。

sentences.english: It organized the 2nd Annual Conference of the International Association for Chinese Management Research (ICMA).
sentences.chinese: 主辦“中國管理研究國際學會第二屆年會”。

sentences.english: Are you satisfied with the jobs of meeting group?
sentences.chinese: 你對公司此次年會的會務組服務工作是否滿意？

sentences.english: Will 2011 be the year of the copycat?
As for China's stealth, a whopping 20 planes by 2024?
sentences.chinese: 至於中國的隱形飛機，到2024年會高達20架？

sentences.english: They will take place after four of its eight annual meetings.
sentences.chinese: 發佈會將在其八個年會的四個之後舉行。

sentences.english: Will 2010 be a year of social unrest?
sentences.chinese: 2010年會是社會動盪不安的一年嗎？

sentences.english: Coverage of the annual meeting will begin in the next issue.
sentences.chinese: 我們將從下期開始報道有關年會的情況。

definition: to arrive at (place or time)/period/to become due/classifier for events, meetings, elections, sporting fixtures, years (of graduation)
